creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: four men seated on either side of a wool rug playing various instruments; a fifth, larger man in black robes with an exposed, hairy belly dances in center of scene; bowl of fruit and tray with two birds in front center of scene; male and female figure visible in adjacent room through drawn blinds; the woman's body ties the two rooms together
title: Seven Lucky Gods
